column5: renovated Mineral Bath House , Wonderful healing Waters for soaks , Labyrinth in Back yard for Walking meditations. Singing Chimes , FIre Pit , Grill for outdoor cooking, Beautiful clear night sky for star gazing. Hanging sky chairs for rest and relaxation. Massage Therapist on hand if you want to schedule some R and R time for yourself. Mysterious magical Orbs that have visit on occasion. Healing Vibro Accoustic Lounge ( sound vibrating table), quite and peaceful setting meditation areas.
